channel.title: When I Attack
channel.description: When I attack an NPC it shows the HP bar above it. And the max it shows is 100, and that is all it shows. So if the NPC has lower than 100 health when I attack it lets say I hit a 15 it takes off like 32 damage. Is there anyway I can fix this?

item.title: When I Attack
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

maybe…maybe not…who knows?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 04:17:20 pm[/size][hr]na , only joking,… just change the clients hp above head to say just nothing…easyer.

Read full topic
